snippet: The singer Andrea Marcovicci, long a fixture at the Oak Room, appeared to be invigorated by her new surroundings at the Café Carlyle.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by singer Andrea Marcovicci at the Cafe Carlyle.
lead_paragraph: The singer Andrea Marcovicci, long a fixture at the Oak Room, appeared to be invigorated by her new surroundings at the Café Carlyle.
